---
node_id: 8
title: Save Transcript History (8)
---
### Save transcript history to the designated markdown vault folder using the appropriate environment variable.

We need to save the transcript history to a markdown file within the designated markdown vault folder. Ensure to use the same environment variable that defines this folder, avoiding duplication, and save it there instead of its current location.
